source.name: Question1
source.instructions: **In the following table select the data type that matches the description.**
source.text:
|**Description** |**Data type**| 
| :------ | :----------- |
|A list of alphanumeric characters.| <<<String>>>|
|A numeric value without a decimal place.|<<<Integer>>>
|Two values: True or False.|<<<Boolean>>>|
|Any number including those with decimal places.|<<<Real>>>|
|A single alphanumeric character.|<<<Character>>>|

text:
|
|A numeric value without a decimal place.|

|
|Any number including those with decimal places.|

source.name: Question2
source.instructions: In the string **This is question 2.** state the index positions of the following characters.
source.text:
The letter ‘h’ = <<<1>>>
The letter ‘q’ = <<<8>>>
The number ‘2’ = <<<17>>>

source.name: Question3
source.instructions: In the string **This is question 2.** State the substrings that would be returned from the following commands.
